incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Tigo Network In Guatemala

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue with SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo Network In Guatemala. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Message Status Update Failures Affecting MMS Messages for a Subset of Customers

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to America Net Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the America Net network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have observed that the issue regarding SMS delays when sending messages to the America Net network in Brazil which is related to the previous incident (https://status.twilio.com/incidents/ywn57tc847pm) now affects all customers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Libyana network in Libya is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 21 October 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Libyana Libya handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

The Mobifone network in Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Mobifone Vietnam handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Yota Russia handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Belarus SMS Carrier Maintenance - A1, MTS and Life

incident_updates.body: The A1, MTS and Life networks in Belarus are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to A1, MTS, Life Belarus handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 24 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US short code.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth
Lookup Identity Match
Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

Our Voice carrier partner in Brazil is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 19:50 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio's Brazil phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Mexico handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
